00018 #include <string>
00019 
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <fstream>
00022 #include <iomanip>
00023 
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 pair<double**, int> readS( string namefile)
00027 {
00028     //read all the info from a punch file
00029     ifstream in(namefile.c_str());       
00030     double **S;
00031     if (!in)
00032     {
00033             cerr << "***Error*** : " << namefile << " doesn't exist.\n";
00034             return make_pair(S,-1);
00035     }
00036     string word;        
00037     int Nbasis;
00038     while( in )
00039     {
00040         getline(in, word);
00041         if (   word == " Two-electron integral symmetry is turned off." 
00042         || word == " Two-electron integral symmetry is turned on.")
00043         {
00044                 in >> word;
00045                 sscanf(word.c_str(), "%i", &Nbasis);
00046                 cerr << "NBasis = " << Nbasis << endl;
00047         }
00048 
00049         if (word.find("*** Overlap")!=string::npos)
00050         {
00051             S = new double * [Nbasis];
00052 
00053             for (int m=0;m<Nbasis;m++)
00054             {
00055                     S[m] = new double[Nbasis];          //get mem for over lap matrix
00056             }   
00057 
00058             for (int j=0; j<Nbasis; j+=5)                       //go through the basis set in steps of 5
00059             {
00060                     getline(in,word);                           //Get labels 
00061                     int line=0;
00062                     for (int i=j; i<Nbasis; i++)
00063                     {
00064                             in >> word;                         //Get label
00065                             if (line<4)
00066                             {                           //Don't have all fields
00067                                     for (int l=0; l<=line; l++)
00068                                     {
00069                                             in >> word;                 
00070                                             size_t pos=word.find("D");
00071                                             word=word.substr(0,pos)+"e"+word.substr(pos+1);
00072                                             sscanf(word.c_str(), "%lf" , &S[j+l][i]);
00073                                             S[i][j+l]=S[j+l][i];
00074                                     }
00075                             }
00076                             else
00077                             {                                   //Have 5 fields
00078                                     for (int l=0; l<=4; l++)
00079                                     {
00080                                             in >> word;
00081                                             size_t pos=word.find("D");
00082                                             word=word.substr(0,pos)+"e"+word.substr(pos+1);
00083                                             sscanf(word.c_str(), "%lf" , &S[j+l][i]);
00084                                             S[i][j+l]=S[j+l][i];
00085                                     }
00086                             }
00087                     line++;
00088                     }//for(i)
00089                     getline(in,word);                           //Appears to be necessary to finish line
00090                 }//for(j)
00091             }//if(*** Overlap)
00092 
00093     }//while(in)
00094     cout << "Read S" << endl;
00095     return make_pair(S, Nbasis); 
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100 int main(int argc, char **argv){
00101     if ( string(argv[1]).compare (  string("--help") ) == 0 ) {
00102         cout << "Usage: name log file, nameoutput " <<endl;         
00103         return 1;
00104     } 
00105 
00106     pair <double**, int> res = readS(string(argv[1]));
00107 
00108     ofstream out(argv[2]);
00109     for (int i =0; i< res.second; i++){
00110         for (int j=0; j< res.second; j++) {
00111             out << scientific << setprecision(8) << res.first[i][j] << "  ";
00112         }
00113         out << '\n';
00114     }
00115 
00116     return 0;
00117 }
